tooltip.proxies.item_proxy: A passive block that redirects every interaction with its inventory to the targeted block.
tooltip.proxies.sided_item_proxy: An item proxy that respects the side the proxy was accessed from.
tooltip.proxies.nullsided_item_proxy: An item proxy that accesses the the target on... "the null-side of the block"??
tooltip.proxies.filtered_item_proxy: An item proxy that allows filtering items.
tooltip.proxies.merger_item_proxy: An item proxy that combines two inventories into one big inventory.
tooltip.proxies.fluid_proxy: A passive block that redirects every interaction with its fluid inventory to the targeted block.
tooltip.proxies.sided_fluid_proxy: A fluid proxy that respects the side the proxy was accessed from.
tooltip.proxies.nullsided_fluid_proxy: An fluid proxy that accesses the the target on... "the null-side of the block"??
tooltip.proxies.filtered_fluid_proxy: A fluid proxy that allows filtering fluids.
tooltip.proxies.merger_fluid_proxy: A fluid proxy that combines two tanks into one big tank.
tooltip.proxies.energy_proxy: A passive block that redirects every interaction with its energy storage to the targeted block.
tooltip.proxies.merger_energy_proxy: An energy proxy that combines two energy storages into one big one.
